questions.questionTitle: What position does the woman probably hold?
What problem does the man have?

script:
� Hello Mary, this is Ted. My flight just landed. I thought you had arranged for someone to meet me here and take me to the hotel.
� I did! Wasn't there someone there holding a sign with your name on it?
� No there wasn't. I've claimed my luggage, and now I'm not sure what to do.
� OK, hold tight and I'll get somebody there as soon as possible. Sorry for the inconvenience.
